title: OCR Benchmarking and Merchant Onboarding Automation
example_bullets: Improved merchant onboarding by benchmarking an OCR system comparing Google, AWS, Azure, with image preprocessing (edge detection, skew correction) to extract and validate ID and bank documents, cutting verification time by 85%.

core.problem: Manual document verification during merchant onboarding was slow and inconsistent due to OCR accuracy limitations.
actions: Benchmarked OCR vendors including Google, AWS, and Azure
Applied image preprocessing techniques such as edge detection and skew correction
Evaluated extraction accuracy across ID and bank documents
Optimized evaluation pipeline to improve processing speed and accuracy

title: Merchant Pricing Exception Automation Framework
example_bullets: Implemented a Python + SQL evaluation pipeline to standardize merchant pricing exception checks and generated Excel visualizations benchmarking merchant scores versus target GMR thresholds, cutting approval cycles from 7 days to 1 day.

Built SQL-based eligibility logic and Excel scorecards comparing merchant performance metrics against proposed gross-margin rates (GMR), automating exception reviews and reducing decision turnaround from 7 days to 1 day.

core.problem: Manual review of merchant gross-margin exception requests led to slow and inconsistent decision-making.
actions: Designed a data-driven decision framework based on merchant performance metrics
Automated eligibility evaluation logic for special gross-margin rates
Integrated performance metrics into the pricing review workflow
Developed Excel scorecards to visualize merchant performance scores against proposed gross-margin rates (GMR) for decision support
outputs: Standardized decision logic for margin exceptions
Excel-based merchant score visualization for pricing approval
results: Reduced review turnaround time from 7 days to 1 day
